attributes.action: Renew Britians out of date laws
attributes.additional_details:
Simple our laws are hundreds of years old and out of date with the 21st century.
For example killing a HRH swan you could serve an extreme sentence however, people who have sent in over 200.000 E protishions to stop criminals receiving benefits looks set to fail! Why? Because the law is out of date and totally on the side of the criminals where the law will not allow this system to be made.
Updating the hundred year old laws would bring the justice system up to date.
